title: I know it's normals and whatnot, but how is this fair?
body:
http://i.gyazo.com/066a9817c742e6f685892961ce9e6b68.png

And then they trash talk, ofc this isnt naming and shaming as they're doing nothing wrong but being BM.
http://i.gyazo.com/b67dc174933225e979263a8072af9461.png

I mean honestly Riot, really?

replies.body: I know that riven, he's a massive autist prone to raging out in solo queue for no reason. I go out of my way to bm him extra hard when he's in my games.

> [{quoted}](name=Corki did 911,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=WGP3bVBz,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-05-26T21:16:12.852+0000)
>
> I know that riven, he's a massive autist prone to raging out in solo queue for no reason. I go out of my way to bm him extra hard when he's in my games.

cool story, it would be a cooler story if you didn't have gold mmr.
Well that's not fair, i cant really speak since im only in bronze, but seriously? Those team hav a huge mmr difference and huge rank difference in season 4

Normal MMR is different from ranked, high elo players want to relax sometimes and there is no way for them to do this if normal MMR was the same as ranked, well actually there is one way and that is if the high elo player makes a smurf, but you wouldn't want a high elo player in your low elo ranked games now would you?
